products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rosewood Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stunning Rosewood Pink roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.productdescription:

This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please.
This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our roller blinds are value for money and easy to install.
For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Flamingo Pink is a beautiful bright pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Flamingo Pink roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stylish pink vertical blind brightens any room . Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bright pink vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!  Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Flamingo Pink Panel Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Flamingo Pink panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold pink panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink Panel Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant, Splash lipstick pink panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your large window.  The bold pink shade, adds flair and saturated colour which can make for a dramatic finish to your room. As our panel blinds are available at 5 metres width and 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a great way to divide a large room or to dress a large window. 
 
Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with a various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rosewood Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Rosewood Pink electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dusty rosewood pink of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2070 Fabric Colour: Rosewood Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
